@graph.caption: Stuffed French Toast cut in half on a white plate

@graph.name: Stuffed French Toast . vegan - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Soft Stuffed French Toast with Blueberry Greek Yogurt is a delicious breakfast that is also vegan. Easy to make, it's a delicious way to start the day

@graph.name: Stuffed French Toast with Blueberry Greek Yogurt
@graph.description: a delicious breakfast that is also vegan. Easy to make, it's a delicious way to start the day
recipeIngredient: a generous pinch of spices of choice (I usually add cloves, cinnamon and nutmeg)
1/3 cup warm water or almond milk

itemListElement.text: Slice the bread into thick slices. Make a deep cut in the middle as seen in the picture.
itemListElement.name: Slice the bread into thick slices. Make a deep cut in the middle as seen in the picture.

itemListElement.text: Stuff the filling(Blueberry Greek Yogurt) carefully so it fills up the cavity well.
itemListElement.name: Stuff the filling(Blueberry Greek Yogurt) carefully so it fills up the cavity well.

itemListElement.text: Dip the slices in the batter and continue with the cooking.
itemListElement.name: Dip the slices in the batter and continue with the cooking.

itemListElement.text: Mix  Oats, flax seed, sugar, spices and warm water. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes. Mix again, dip slices and pan fry them on medium-low, in a Tablespoon or so organic canola or coconut oil. 3-4 minutes each side.
itemListElement.name: Mix  Oats, flax seed, sugar, spices and warm water. Mix well and let sit for 5 minutes. Mix again, dip slices and pan fry them on medium-low, in a Tablespoon or so organic canola or coconut oil. 3-4 minutes each side.
